bard:HarmoniousVoice.NAME: Harmonious Voice
bard:HarmoniousVoice.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you queue a {Block Note} or {Buff Note} , gain !M! Temporary_HP.

bard:DiscordantVoice.NAME: Discordant Voice
bard:DiscordantVoice.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you queue a {Attack Note} or {Debuff Note} , deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

bard:BestowCurse.NAME: Bestow Curse
bard:BestowCurse.DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes !M! damage at the start of each of its turns. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

bard:FeastOnFear.NAME: Feast on Fear
bard:FeastOnFear.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy is Vulnerable, gain !M! Temporary_HP instead.

bard:Thunderwave.NAME: Thunderwave
bard:Thunderwave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

bard:SongBolt.NAME: Song Bolt
bard:SongBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Note you have queued. NL Clear your Note queue.

bard:QuickSong.NAME: Quick Song
bard:QuickSong.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Queue Notes as if the card was played. NL Play a Melody.

bard:TinyHut.NAME: Tiny Hut
bard:TinyHut.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card for each {Block Note} you have queued.

bard:Gamble.NAME: Gamble
bard:Gamble.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card type (Attack/Skill/Power). NL Draw 1 card, if it is the chosen type, it costs 0 this turn.

bard:DervishDance.NAME: Dervish Dance
bard:DervishDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each {Attack Note} you have queued.

bard:Parry.NAME: Parry
bard:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Dexterity affects this card !M! times.

bard:Balestra.NAME: Balestra
bard:Balestra.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL This card's damage is affected by Dexterity instead of Strength.

bard:Invisibility.NAME: Invisibility
bard:Invisibility.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Draw !M! more card next turn. NL Exhaust.
bard:Invisibility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Draw !M! more cards next turn. NL Exhaust.

bard:Advance.NAME: Advance
bard:Advance.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Lose [E] next turn.

bard:GuardPoint.NAME: Guard Point
bard:GuardPoint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have no {Block Note} queued, gain !B! Block again.

bard:Hum.NAME: Hum
bard:Hum.DESCRIPTION: Play a Melody. NL Gain !B! Block.

bard:InspiringSong.NAME: Inspiring Song
bard:InspiringSong.DESCRIPTION: Gain Inspiration !bard:In!   for each {Buff Note} you have queued.

bard:Shout.NAME: Shout
bard:Shout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Decrease this card's Strength loss by 1 this combat.

bard:Silence.NAME: Silence
bard:Silence.DESCRIPTION: Enemy cannot debuff you. NL Exhaust.
bard:Silence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy cannot buff itself or debuff you. NL Exhaust.

bard:Aphasia.NAME: Aphasia
bard:Aphasia.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose between !bard:M2! and !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

bard:PrismaticSpray.NAME: Prismatic Spray
bard:PrismaticSpray.DESCRIPTION: Add X random Attacks of any color into your hand. NL They are Ethereal, Exhaust, and cost 0.
bard:PrismaticSpray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X+1 random Attacks of any color into your hand. NL They are Ethereal, Exhaust, and cost 0.

bard:LifeDrain.NAME: Life Drain
bard:LifeDrain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Temporary_HP for half the unlocked damage dealt.

bard:MnemonicVestments.NAME: Mnemonic Vestments
bard:MnemonicVestments.DESCRIPTION: Choose any card in your deck and shuffle a 0-cost, Exhaust copy of that card into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
bard:MnemonicVestments.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose any card in your deck and shuffle a 0-cost, Exhaustive 2 copy of that card into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

bard:SplendidForm.NAME: Splendid Form
bard:SplendidForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of NL your turn, gain NL Inspiration !bard:In!.

bard:PowerWordStun.NAME: Power Word Stun
bard:PowerWordStun.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has less than !bard:M2! % HP, Stun it for !M! turn.

bard:LingeringEcho.NAME: Lingering Echo
bard:LingeringEcho.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next card you play this turn remains in your hand.

bard:ReverseGravity.NAME: Reverse Gravity
bard:ReverseGravity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Next turn, deal !bard:M2! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies again.

bard:CovetousAura.NAME: Covetous Aura
bard:CovetousAura.DESCRIPTION: Anytime an enemy gains HP or Strength, you also gain the same HP or Strength.

bard:EnGarde.NAME: En Garde
bard:EnGarde.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Inspiration affects this card !M! times.

bard:GlyphOfWarding.NAME: Glyph of Warding
bard:GlyphOfWarding.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your Block is broken, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

bard:Wish.NAME: Wish
bard:Wish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose any non-rare card. Permanently replace this card with the chosen card. NL Purge.

bard:Shifting.NAME: Shifting
bard:Shifting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage or NL gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage or NL gain !B! Block.

bard:Motivation.NAME: Motivation
bard:Motivation.DESCRIPTION: Increase all Inspiration you gain by !bard:M2!.

bard:LocateObject.NAME: Locate Object
bard:LocateObject.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your draw pile on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
bard:LocateObject.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your draw pile on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

bard:SoothingSong.NAME: Soothing Song
bard:SoothingSong.DESCRIPTION: Play a Melody. NL Heal !M! HP for each Note in the Melody. NL Exhaust.

bard:Pluck.NAME: Pluck
bard:Pluck.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Note to queue. NL Draw a card.
bard:Pluck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! Notes to queue. NL Draw a card.
